description: This Dart file defines a custom Flutter ThemeData for an application, including customized colors, app bar, card, input decoration, floating action button, tab bar, chip, divider themes, and page transition styles. It also provides a background decoration function with a gradient.

methods.name: buildOceanProfessionalTheme
methods.description: Creates and returns a customized ThemeData object with specific styling for various UI components, using color schemes, font styles, and shapes.

methods.name: oceanGradientBackground
methods.description: Returns a BoxDecoration with a subtle linear gradient background suitable for use as a background decoration.
